results.text: Listen, my son, to your father’s instruction and do not forsake your mother’s teaching. They are a garland to grace your head and a chain to adorn your neck.
results.reason: Emphasizes the importance of parental guidance and wisdom.
results.reflection: Trusting in the guidance and teaching of parents can bring blessings and adornment in life.

results.text: My son, keep your father’s command and do not forsake your mother’s teaching.
results.reflection: Honoring and following the instructions of parents is a sign of trust and respect.

results.text: Listen to your father, who gave you life, and do not despise your mother when she is old.
results.reason: Highlights the value of listening to parents and honoring them.
results.reflection: Respecting and listening to parents, especially in old age, is an important aspect of trust and honor.

results.text: Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. 'Honor your father and mother'—which is the first commandment with a promise—
results.reason: Teaches the significance of honoring parents as part of God's commandment.
results.reflection: Obeying and honoring parents is not only right but also carries a promise of blessings.

results.text: Children, obey your parents in everything, for this pleases the Lord.
results.reason: Emphasizes the pleasing nature of obeying parents in God's eyes.
results.reflection: Trusting and obeying parents is not just a sign of respect but also a way to please God.
